input: The function of the pro-tem in the absence of Speaker is to

options.A: conduct the proceedings of the House in the absence of speakers.
options.B: officiate as speaker when the speaker is to be elected
options.C: only check if the election certificates of the members are in order

explanation: The first meeting after the election when the Speaker and the Deputy Speaker are selected by members of the Parliament is held under the Protem Speaker.
